name: Chapter 14: The Convergence
short_description: Sarah realizes that the only way to save the magical world from destruction is to create a massive magi-tech device that will harmonize all magical energies. As she works feverishly, she discovers a way that might also open a portal back to her original world. Sarah must choose between returning home and saving her new world.
events: Creation of the harmonizing device, discovery of potential way home, Sarah's internal conflict
people: Sarah, her loyal team, government officials
places: Sarah's main laboratory, sites of magical disturbances
from_prev_chapter: The final confrontation and resolution of the magi-tech crisis
to_next_chapter: Activation of the harmonizing device and its consequences
